metadata.name: !Sewing machine
metadata.description:
[h1]Make your familiars stronger ![/h1]
The [b]Sewing Machine[/b] is a brand new machine which allows you to [b]upgrade your familiars[/b] during a run !
This mod include also 3 new items, 6 new trinkets and 3 new cards related to the Sewing Machine.
--------------------------------
The sewing machine act like a slot machine. When interacting with the machine you will [b]add a random familiar[/b] in the machine. Interacting a second time with the machine will allow you to retrieve the familiar with a special upgrade. [b]Upgrades have a cost[/b], it can be a soul heart, or coins or. When a familiar is in the machine, you can retrieve it when bombing the machine. Sewing machine can be found in [b]bedrooms[/b], [b]shops[/b]. Familiars can be upgradable twice. A crown icon indicate their level.
--------------------------------
[h1]Modded familiars[/h1] [b]Some modded familiars can work with the machine, including : [/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1991915308]Lost And Forgotten[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1925867065]IPECAC Community Mod[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=840727122]Marshmallow[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2558097541]Mini-Min[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2575063734]Little Bishop[/url]
[h3]To make you own familiar upgradable :[/h3] https://github.com/valentinLampriere/Isaac_Sewing-Machine/wiki
--------------------------------
Please let me know if you encounter bugs !
Some familiars aren't upgradable now. This mod will be updated and will make more and more familiars available !
[b]Share your ideas[/b] in the comments or contact me if you have new ideas for familiars upgrades, you can also join the discord server (link below) !
--------------------------------
